mapper.select: SELECT y1.`name`, COUNT(*) 'count' FROM whg_act_activity a1, whg_ywi_type y1 WHERE a1.etype = y1.id AND y1.type = 4 AND a1.state = 6 AND a1.delstate = 0 AND y1.state = 1 GROUP BY y1.id;
SELECT y1.`name`, COUNT(*) 'count' FROM whg_act_activity a1, whg_ywi_type y1 WHERE a1.areaid = y1.id AND y1.type = 6 AND a1.state = 6 AND a1.delstate = 0 AND y1.state = 1 GROUP BY y1.id;

SELECT MONTH (a1.statemdfdate) mymonth, COUNT(a1.id) mycount FROM whg_act_activity a1 WHERE a1.state = 6 AND a1.delstate = 0 AND a1.statemdfdate > #{startdate} AND a1.statemdfdate < #{enddate} GROUP BY mymonth;

SELECT count(d.visit_eid) viewcount, d.visit_eid id, a1.name, ( SELECT count(d1.visit_eid) FROM whg_visit_data d1 WHERE d1.visit_eid = d.visit_eid AND d1.visit_etype = 1 AND d1.visit_type = 1 ) pccount, ( SELECT count(d2.visit_eid) FROM whg_visit_data d2 WHERE d2.visit_eid = d.visit_eid AND d2.visit_etype = 1 AND d2.visit_type = 2 ) wxcount FROM whg_visit_data d INNER JOIN whg_act_activity a1 ON d.visit_eid = a1.id WHERE d.visit_etype = 1 GROUP BY d.visit_eid ORDER BY viewcount DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT a1.name,(SELECT count(c1.cmid) FROM wh_collection c1 WHERE c1.cmrefid = a1.id AND c1.cmopttyp = 0) collectcount, (SELECT count(m1.rmid) FROM wh_comment m1 WHERE m1.rmrefid = a1.id AND m1.rmtyp = 0) commentcount, (SELECT count(c1.cmid) FROM wh_collection c1 WHERE c1.cmrefid = a1.id AND c1.cmopttyp = 2) remcount, (SELECT count(o1.id) FROM whg_rep_order o1 WHERE o1.entid = a1.id) ordercount, (SELECT count(o2.id) FROM whg_rep_order o2 WHERE o2.entid = a1.id AND o2.devtype = 0) pcordercount, (SELECT count(o3.id) FROM whg_rep_order o3 WHERE o3.entid = a1.id AND o3.devtype = 1) wxordercount, (SELECT COUNT(at1.id) FROM whg_act_order ao,whg_act_ticket at1 WHERE ao.activityid = a1.id AND at1.orderid = ao.id) ticcount, (SELECT COUNT(at1.id) FROM whg_act_order ao,whg_act_ticket at1 WHERE ao.activityid = a1.id AND at1.orderid = ao.id AND at1.ticketstatus = 1) checkticcount from whg_act_activity a1 where a1.state = 6 AND a1.delstate = 0
AND a1.name LIKE "%"#{title}"%"
ORDER BY collectcount desc
ORDER BY commentcount desc
ORDER BY remcount desc
ORDER BY ordercount desc
ORDER BY pcordercount desc
ORDER BY wxordercount desc
ORDER BY ticcount desc
ORDER BY checkticcount desc
ORDER BY collectcount asc
ORDER BY commentcount asc
ORDER BY remcount asc
ORDER BY ordercount asc
ORDER BY pcordercount asc
ORDER BY wxordercount asc
ORDER BY ticcount asc
ORDER BY checkticcount asc
